thread.title: Baltimore named No. 1 city for bed bugs
thread.title_full: Baltimore named No. 1 city for bed bugs

author: Brittany Britto
title: Baltimore named No. 1 city for bed bugs
text:
Baltimore named No. 1 city for bed bugs Bed bugs crawl around in a container on JEWEL SAMAD / AFP/Getty Images Bed bugs crawl around in a container on display during the 2nd National Bed Bug Conference in Washington, DC, February 2, 2011. In response to consumer concern about the rising incidence of bed bugs in the United States, the Federal Bed Bug Workgroup will hold the National Bed Bug Summit on February 1-2, 2011. During the meeting, panels will discuss bed bug initiatives, identify gaps in knowledge and outline suggested ideas for improving control on a community-wide basis. AFP PHOTO/Jewel Samad (Photo credit should read JEWEL SAMAD/AFP/Getty Images) Bed bugs crawl around in a container on display during the 2nd National Bed Bug Conference in Washington, DC, February 2, 2011. In response to consumer concern about the rising incidence of bed bugs in the United States, the Federal Bed Bug Workgroup will hold the National Bed Bug Summit on February 1-2, 2011. During the meeting, panels will discuss bed bug initiatives, identify gaps in knowledge and outline suggested ideas for improving control on a community-wide basis. AFP PHOTO/Jewel Samad (Photo credit should read JEWEL SAMAD/AFP/Getty Images) (JEWEL SAMAD / AFP/Getty Images) Brittany Britto , a prime city for viewing Christmas lights , and one of last year’s hottest travel destinations . We're even said to have one of the best city parks in the U.S. 
2017, however, is starting off with a less positive, more pesky superlative. 
Atlanta-based pest control company Orkin released this year’s list of “Top 50 Bed Bug Cities” on Tuesday, and Baltimore came in at No. 1, the first time it's been featured in the top five in the past six years. Facts About Bed Bugs 
Wacky, weird but true facts about bed bugs. 
Wacky, weird but true facts about bed bugs. 
The company based the rankings on where it performed the most bed bug treatments from December 2015 to November 2016. Charm City moved up a total of nine spots since last year. 
It must be a regional thing, because nearby Washington came in at No. 2. 
Rounding out the top five were Chicago, New York and Columbus, Ohio, respectively.
